mapper.select: select id, assignee_id, assignee_name, phone, priority, status, ware_id, amount, create_time, update_time from wms_purchase where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wms_purchase(assignee_id, assignee_name, phone, priority, status, ware_id, amount, create_time, update_time) values (#{assigneeId}, #{assigneeName}, #{phone}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{wareId}, #{amount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into wms_purchase(assignee_id, assignee_name, phone, priority, status, ware_id, amount, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.assigneeId}, #{entity.assigneeName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.priority}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.wareId}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into wms_purchase(assignee_id, assignee_name, phone, priority, status, ware_id, amount, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.assigneeId}, #{entity.assigneeName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.priority}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.wareId}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update assignee_id = values(assignee_id), assignee_name = values(assignee_name), phone = values(phone), priority = values(priority), status = values(status), ware_id = values(ware_id), amount = values(amount), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update wms_purchase
assignee_id = #{assigneeId},
assignee_name = #{assigneeName},
phone = #{phone},
priority = #{priority},
status = #{status},
ware_id = #{wareId},
amount = #{amount},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
